actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to designate the Great Bear Wilderness, Flathead National Forest, and enlarge the Bob Marshall Wilderness, Flathead and Lewis and Clark National Forests, State of Montana.

summary.text: Designates specified lands in Montana as the Great Bear Wilderness, to be included in the Flathead National Forest, Montana. Enlarges the Bob Marshall Wilderness to include specified lands in Montana as a part of the Lewis and Clark National Forest.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Great Bear Wilderness, Flathead National Forest, and enlarge the Bob Marshall Wilderness, Flathead and Lewis and Clark National Forests, State of Montana.
